name: ProlifiCrops: Carrot Fever
description:
Welcome to Prolificrops ! 

Help Lupin the rabbit to run his shop by harvesting and selling the carrots ! They grow quite uncontrollably to say the least, which could be a problem... You surely don't want an ocean of vegetables to invade your house !

Try to hold on as long as you can, and don't go bankrupt !

This game is meant to be played with a mouse

Xeo an Qualia here ! We hope that you'll enjoy this little project. It was our second gamejam together, and we had a really great time ! Making a game as modest as it is in such a limited time fuels inspiration and motivation, hopefully this game conveys these latter ! Thank you for playing ! 

Designed by Xeonadow and Qualia

Programmed by Xeonadow

All assets by Qualia http://instagram.com/qualianima/

Musics:
"Happy Day!" Free Music By HeatleyBros
"Where To?" Free Music By HeatleyBros
Free Music For Your Youtube Video on HeatleyBros's Youtube channel

Sounds effects from https://freesound.org/
